The Sioux City Council on Monday formally accepted the donation of 13 bronze busts of people who dedicated their lives to represent minority and marginalized groups in Siouxland .

The busts are being sculpted by Mark Avery , of McCook Lake , S.D. The Celebrating Community Project is planned for the east side of the Martin Luther King Jr .
The bronze busts will be mounted on pedestals alongside the building with plaques indicating why the person was honored .
A bar code also is planned so visitors can use their smartphones to access additional information .
